title: Beat the Heat! Beautiful resort style pool and spa. Parking. Gym
neighborhood: 17171 West Roscoe Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA
posting_body: ['Located in Northridge, CA, Village Pointe is an apartment community with a laid-back, resort-style atmosphere that blends Mediterranean architecture with 6 acres of tropical garden paths and courtyards.', "With a dedicated onsite management team that treats the residents like family, Village Pointe is not just your home, it's your community.", '- Relaxing jet spa', '- Large year-round resort-style heated pool', '- Garden, pool and greenbelt views', '- Mirrored wardrobe', '- Walk-in closets', '- DSL/high-speed internet/cable available', '- Beautiful green courtyards with 6 acres of lush, tropical landscaping', '- Balcony or patio', '- Assigned/ covered parking', '- Professional on-site management', '- Fully gated community', '- Evening courtesy patrol', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Pricing is subject to change.', 'Call for details.']
